projects.title: Easy Khata
projects.description: Pakistan's #1 digital ledger app that significantly reduced acquisition costs
projects.challenge: Create an intuitive bookkeeping app with regional linguistic appeal for non-tech-savvy merchants
projects.solution: Conducted in-depth linguistic research and designed multi-language UI with familiar interaction patterns
projects.impact: 3M+ downloads with 38% increase in user engagement within first quarter

testimonial.quote: Huda's design made complex bookkeeping feel as simple as WhatsApp
testimonial.author: Hamza Jawaid

projects.title: Surf Excel Pakistan
projects.description: Packaging design consultation for Pakistan's leading detergent brand
projects.challenge: Modernize Surf Excel packaging while maintaining brand heritage and local appeal
projects.solution: Created contemporary packaging designs that honor the brand's 'Daag achay hotay hain' legacy
projects.impact: Enhanced shelf presence and contributed to maintaining 37% market share

testimonial.quote: Huda's design approach perfectly balanced modernity with our brand heritage
testimonial.author: Marketing Director
